imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

username.description: Name for a custom user to create (overrides `auth.username`)

password.description: Password for the custom user to create (overrides `auth.password`)

database.description: Name for a custom database to create (overrides `auth.database`)

existingSecret.description: Name of existing secret to use for PostgreSQL credentials (overrides `auth.existingSecret`).

adminPasswordKey.description: Name of key in existing secret to use for PostgreSQL credentials (overrides `auth.secretKeys.adminPasswordKey`). Only used when `global.postgresql.auth.existingSecret` is set.

userPasswordKey.description: Name of key in existing secret to use for PostgreSQL credentials (overrides `auth.secretKeys.userPasswordKey`). Only used when `global.postgresql.auth.existingSecret` is set.

replicationPasswordKey.description: Name of key in existing secret to use for PostgreSQL credentials (overrides `auth.secretKeys.replicationPasswordKey`). Only used when `global.postgresql.auth.existingSecret` is set.

nameOverride.description: String to partially override common.names.fullname template (will maintain the release name)

fullnameOverride.description: String to fully override common.names.fullname template

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release (evaluated as a template)

commonLabels.description: Add labels to all the deployed resources

commonAnnotations.description: Add annotations to all the deployed resources

enabled.description: Enable diagnostic mode (all probes will be disabled and the command will be overridden)

command.description: Command to override all containers in the statefulset

args.description: Args to override all containers in the statefulset

tag.description: PostgreSQL image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: PostgreSQL image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

debug.description: Specify if debug values should be set

enablePostgresUser.description: Assign a password to the "postgres" admin user. Otherwise, remote access will be blocked for this user

postgresPassword.description: Password for the "postgres" admin user. Ignored if `auth.existingSecret` is provided

username.description: Name for a custom user to create

password.description: Password for the custom user to create. Ignored if `auth.existingSecret` is provided

database.description: Name for a custom database to create

replicationPassword.description: Password for the replication user. Ignored if `auth.existingSecret` is provided

existingSecret.description: Name of existing secret to use for PostgreSQL credentials. `auth.postgresPassword`, `auth.password`, and `auth.replicationPassword` will be ignored and picked up from this secret. The secret might also contains the key `ldap-password` if LDAP is enabled. `ldap.bind_password` will be ignored and picked from this secret in this case.

adminPasswordKey.description: Name of key in existing secret to use for PostgreSQL credentials. Only used when `auth.existingSecret` is set.

userPasswordKey.description: Name of key in existing secret to use for PostgreSQL credentials. Only used when `auth.existingSecret` is set.

replicationPasswordKey.description: Name of key in existing secret to use for PostgreSQL credentials. Only used when `auth.existingSecret` is set.

usePasswordFiles.description: Mount credentials as a files instead of using an environment variable

synchronousCommit.description: Set synchronous commit mode. Allowed values: `on`, `remote_apply`, `remote_write`, `local` and `off`

numSynchronousReplicas.description: Number of replicas that will have synchronous replication. Note: Cannot be greater than `readReplicas.replicaCount`.

applicationName.description: Cluster application name. Useful for advanced replication settings

logConnections.description: Add client log-in operations to the log file

logDisconnections.description: Add client log-outs operations to the log file

pgAuditLog.description: Add operations to log using the pgAudit extension

clientMinMessages.description: Message log level to share with the user

logLinePrefix.description: Template for log line prefix (default if not set)

enabled.description: Enable LDAP support

server.description: IP address or name of the LDAP server.

port.description: Port number on the LDAP server to connect to

prefix.description: String to prepend to the user name when forming the DN to bind

suffix.description: String to append to the user name when forming the DN to bind

basedn.description: Root DN to begin the search for the user in

binddn.description: DN of user to bind to LDAP

bindpw.description: Password for the user to bind to LDAP

searchAttribute.description: Attribute to match against the user name in the search

searchFilter.description: The search filter to use when doing search+bind authentication

enabled.description: Se to true to enable TLS encryption

uri.description: LDAP URL beginning in the form `ldap[s]://host[:port]/basedn`. If provided, all the other LDAP parameters will be ignored.

enabled.description: Enable emptyDir volume for /dev/shm for PostgreSQL pod(s)

sizeLimit.description: Set this to enable a size limit on the shm tmpfs

enabled.description: Enable TLS traffic support

preferServerCiphers.description: Whether to use the server's TLS cipher preferences rather than the client's

certificatesSecret.description: Name of an existing secret that contains the certificates

crlFilename.description: File containing a Certificate Revocation List

name.description: Name of the primary database (eg primary, master, leader, ...)

configuration.description: PostgreSQL Primary main configuration to be injected as ConfigMap

existingConfigmap.description: Name of an existing ConfigMap with PostgreSQL Primary configuration

extendedConfiguration.description: Extended PostgreSQL Primary configuration (appended to main or default configuration)

existingExtendedConfigmap.description: Name of an existing ConfigMap with PostgreSQL Primary extended configuration

postgresqlWalDir.description: Specify a custom location for the PostgreSQL transaction log

scriptsConfigMap.description: ConfigMap with scripts to be run at first boot

scriptsSecret.description: Secret with scripts to be run at first boot (in case it contains sensitive information)

user.description: Specify the PostgreSQL username to execute the initdb scripts

password.description: Specify the PostgreSQL password to execute the initdb scripts

enabled.description: Whether to enable current cluster's primary as standby server of another cluster or not

primaryHost.description: The Host of replication primary in the other cluster

primaryPort.description: The Port of replication primary in the other cluster

extraEnvVars.description: Array with extra environment variables to add to PostgreSQL Primary nodes

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for PostgreSQL Primary nodes

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for PostgreSQL Primary nodes

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

enabled.description: Enable livenessProbe on PostgreSQL Primary containers
Enable readinessProbe on PostgreSQL Primary containers
Enable startupProbe on PostgreSQL Primary containers

customLivenessProbe.description: Custom livenessProbe that overrides the default one

customReadinessProbe.description: Custom readinessProbe that overrides the default one

customStartupProbe.description: Custom startupProbe that overrides the default one

lifecycleHooks.description: for the PostgreSQL Primary container to automate configuration before or after startup

limits.description: The resources limits for the PostgreSQL Primary containers

memory.description: The requested memory for the PostgreSQL Primary containers

cpu.description: The requested cpu for the PostgreSQL Primary containers

enabled.description: Enable security context
Enable container security context

hostNetwork.description: Specify if host network should be enabled for PostgreSQL pod (postgresql primary)

hostIPC.description: Specify if host IPC should be enabled for PostgreSQL pod (postgresql primary)

labels.description: Map of labels to add to the statefulset (postgresql primary)

podLabels.description: Map of labels to add to the pods (postgresql primary)

podAnnotations.description: Map of annotations to add to the pods (postgresql primary)

podAffinityPreset.description: PostgreSQL primary pod affinity preset. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: PostgreSQL primary pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: PostgreSQL primary node affinity preset type. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: PostgreSQL primary node label key to match Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set.

values.description: PostgreSQL primary node label values to match. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set.

affinity.description: Affinity for PostgreSQL primary pods assignment

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for PostgreSQL primary pods assignment

tolerations.description: Tolerations for PostgreSQL primary pods assignment

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for pod assignment spread across your cluster among failure-domains. Evaluated as a template

priorityClassName.description: Priority Class to use for each pod (postgresql primary)

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Seconds PostgreSQL primary pod needs to terminate gracefully

rollingUpdate.description: PostgreSQL Primary statefulset rolling update configuration parameters

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for the PostgreSQL Primary container(s)

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes for the PostgreSQL Primary pod(s)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers to the PostgreSQL Primary pod(s)

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers to the PostgreSQL Primary pod(s)

extraPodSpec.description: Optionally specify extra PodSpec for the PostgreSQL Primary pod(s)

clusterIP.description: Static clusterIP or None for headless services

loadBalancerIP.description: Load balancer IP if service type is `LoadBalancer`

loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: Addresses that are allowed when service is LoadBalancer

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose in the PostgreSQL primary service

sessionAffinity.description: Session Affinity for Kubernetes service, can be "None" or "ClientIP"

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for headless PostgreSQL primary service

enabled.description: Enable PostgreSQL Primary data persistence using PVC

existingClaim.description: Name of an existing PVC to use

mountPath.description: The path the volume will be mounted at

subPath.description: The subdirectory of the volume to mount to

storageClass.description: PVC Storage Class for PostgreSQL Primary data volume

accessModes.description: PVC Access Mode for PostgreSQL volume

size.description: PVC Storage Request for PostgreSQL volume

selector.description: Selector to match an existing Persistent Volume (this value is evaluated as a template)

enabled.description: Enable Persistent volume retention policy for Primary Statefulset

whenScaled.description: Volume retention behavior when the replica count of the StatefulSet is reduced

whenDeleted.description: Volume retention behavior that applies when the StatefulSet is deleted

name.description: Name of the read replicas database (eg secondary, slave, ...)

replicaCount.description: Number of PostgreSQL read only replicas

extendedConfiguration.description: Extended PostgreSQL read only replicas configuration (appended to main or default configuration)

extraEnvVars.description: Array with extra environment variables to add to PostgreSQL read only nodes

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for PostgreSQL read only nodes

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for PostgreSQL read only nodes

command.description: Override default container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default container args (useful when using custom images)

enabled.description: Enable livenessProbe on PostgreSQL read only containers
Enable readinessProbe on PostgreSQL read only containers
Enable startupProbe on PostgreSQL read only containers

customLivenessProbe.description: Custom livenessProbe that overrides the default one

customReadinessProbe.description: Custom readinessProbe that overrides the default one

customStartupProbe.description: Custom startupProbe that overrides the default one

lifecycleHooks.description: for the PostgreSQL read only container to automate configuration before or after startup

limits.description: The resources limits for the PostgreSQL read only containers

memory.description: The requested memory for the PostgreSQL read only containers

cpu.description: The requested cpu for the PostgreSQL read only containers

enabled.description: Enable security context
Enable container security context

hostAliases.description: PostgreSQL read only pods host aliases

hostNetwork.description: Specify if host network should be enabled for PostgreSQL pod (PostgreSQL read only)

hostIPC.description: Specify if host IPC should be enabled for PostgreSQL pod (postgresql primary)

labels.description: Map of labels to add to the statefulset (PostgreSQL read only)

annotations.description: Annotations for PostgreSQL read only pods

podLabels.description: Map of labels to add to the pods (PostgreSQL read only)

podAnnotations.description: Map of annotations to add to the pods (PostgreSQL read only)

podAffinityPreset.description: PostgreSQL read only pod affinity preset. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: PostgreSQL read only pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: PostgreSQL read only node affinity preset type. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: PostgreSQL read only node label key to match Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set.

values.description: PostgreSQL read only node label values to match. Ignored if `primary.affinity` is set.

affinity.description: Affinity for PostgreSQL read only pods assignment

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for PostgreSQL read only pods assignment

tolerations.description: Tolerations for PostgreSQL read only pods assignment

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for pod assignment spread across your cluster among failure-domains. Evaluated as a template

priorityClassName.description: Priority Class to use for each pod (PostgreSQL read only)

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Seconds PostgreSQL read only pod needs to terminate gracefully

type.description: PostgreSQL read only statefulset strategy type

rollingUpdate.description: PostgreSQL read only statefulset rolling update configuration parameters

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for the PostgreSQL read only container(s)

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes for the PostgreSQL read only pod(s)

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers to the PostgreSQL read only pod(s)

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers to the PostgreSQL read only pod(s)

extraPodSpec.description: Optionally specify extra PodSpec for the PostgreSQL read only pod(s)

clusterIP.description: Static clusterIP or None for headless services

annotations.description: Annotations for PostgreSQL read only service

loadBalancerIP.description: Load balancer IP if service type is `LoadBalancer`

loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: Addresses that are allowed when service is LoadBalancer

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose in the PostgreSQL read only service

sessionAffinity.description: Session Affinity for Kubernetes service, can be "None" or "ClientIP"

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for headless PostgreSQL read only service

enabled.description: Enable PostgreSQL read only data persistence using PVC

existingClaim.description: Name of an existing PVC to use

mountPath.description: The path the volume will be mounted at

subPath.description: The subdirectory of the volume to mount to

storageClass.description: PVC Storage Class for PostgreSQL read only data volume

accessModes.description: PVC Access Mode for PostgreSQL volume

size.description: PVC Storage Request for PostgreSQL volume

selector.description: Selector to match an existing Persistent Volume (this value is evaluated as a template)

enabled.description: Enable Persistent volume retention policy for read only Statefulset

whenScaled.description: Volume retention behavior when the replica count of the StatefulSet is reduced

whenDeleted.description: Volume retention behavior that applies when the StatefulSet is deleted

enabled.description: Enable the logical dump of the database "regularly"

runAsUser.description: User ID for the backup container

runAsGroup.description: Group ID for the backup container

runAsNonRoot.description: Set backup container's Security Context runAsNonRoot

allowPrivilegeEscalation.description: Is it possible to escalate backup pod(s) privileges

type.description: Set backup container's Security Context seccompProfile type

drop.description: Set backup container's Security Context capabilities to drop

command.description: Set backup container's command to run

resourcePolicy.description: Setting it to "keep" to avoid removing PVCs during a helm delete operation. Leaving it empty will delete PVCs after the chart deleted

storageClass.description: PVC Storage Class for the backup data volume

size.description: PVC Storage Request for the backup data volume

mountPath.description: Path to mount the volume at

subPath.description: Subdirectory of the volume to mount at

selector.description: A label query over volumes to consider for binding (e.g. when using local volumes)

enabled.description: Enable network policies
Enable network policies for metrics (prometheus)
Enable ingress rule that makes PostgreSQL primary node only accessible from a particular origin.

customRules.description: Custom network policy for the PostgreSQL primary node.

enabled.description: Enable ingress rule that makes PostgreSQL read-only nodes only accessible from a particular origin.

customRules.description: Custom network policy for the PostgreSQL read-only nodes.

denyConnectionsToExternal.description: Enable egress rule that denies outgoing traffic outside the cluster, except for DNS (port 53).

enabled.description: Enable init container that changes the owner and group of the persistent volume

tag.description: Init container volume-permissions image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: Init container volume-permissions image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullPolicy.description: Init container volume-permissions image pull policy

pullSecrets.description: Init container volume-permissions image pull secrets

runAsUser.description: User ID for the init container

runAsGroup.description: Group ID for the init container

enabled.description: Create secret for service binding (Experimental)

create.description: Enable creation of ServiceAccount for PostgreSQL pod

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use.

automountServiceAccountToken.description: Allows auto mount of ServiceAccountToken on the serviceAccount created

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for the ServiceAccount

create.description: Create Role and RoleBinding (required for PSP to work)
Whether to create a PodSecurityPolicy. WARNING: PodSecurityPolicy is deprecated in Kubernetes v1.21 or later, unavailable in v1.25 or later

enabled.description: Start a prometheus exporter

tag.description: PostgreSQL Prometheus Exporter image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

digest.description: PostgreSQL image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag

pullPolicy.description: PostgreSQL Prometheus Exporter image pull policy

extraEnvVars.description: Extra environment variables to add to PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter

enabled.description: Enable PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter containers' Security Context

runAsUser.description: Set PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter containers' Security Context runAsUser

runAsGroup.description: Set PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter containers' Security Context runAsGroup

runAsNonRoot.description: Set PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter containers' Security Context runAsNonRoot

allowPrivilegeEscalation.description: Set PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter containers' Security Context allowPrivilegeEscalation

type.description: Set PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter containers' Security Context seccompProfile.type

drop.description: Set PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter containers' Security Context capabilities.drop

enabled.description: Enable livenessProbe on PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter containers
Enable readinessProbe on PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter containers
Enable startupProbe on PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter containers

customLivenessProbe.description: Custom livenessProbe that overrides the default one

customReadinessProbe.description: Custom readinessProbe that overrides the default one

customStartupProbe.description: Custom startupProbe that overrides the default one

metrics.description: PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter metrics container port

limits.description: The resources limits for the PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter container

requests.description: The requested resources for the PostgreSQL Prometheus exporter container

clusterIP.description: Static clusterIP or None for headless services

sessionAffinity.description: Control where client requests go, to the same pod or round-robin

enabled.description: Create ServiceMonitor Resource for scraping metrics using Prometheus Operator

namespace.description: Namespace for the ServiceMonitor Resource (defaults to the Release Namespace)

interval.description: Interval at which metrics should be scraped.

scrapeTimeout.description: Timeout after which the scrape is ended

labels.description: Additional labels that can be used so ServiceMonitor will be discovered by Prometheus

relabelings.description: RelabelConfigs to apply to samples before scraping

metricRelabelings.description: MetricRelabelConfigs to apply to samples before ingestion

honorLabels.description: Specify honorLabels parameter to add the scrape endpoint

jobLabel.description: The name of the label on the target service to use as the job name in prometheus.

enabled.description: Create a PrometheusRule for Prometheus Operator

namespace.description: Namespace for the PrometheusRule Resource (defaults to the Release Namespace)

labels.description: Additional labels that can be used so PrometheusRule will be discovered by Prometheus
